awards:
第76届戛纳电影节(2023)
　　一种关注单元 一种关注大奖(提名) 让-贝尔纳·马赫兰

writer.name: 让-贝尔纳·马赫兰 Jean-Bernard Marlin

director.name: 让-贝尔纳·马赫兰 Jean-Bernard Marlin

introduction: 14-year-old Grasshoppers gang member Djibril leads a dangerous existence in a Marseille slum, along with his pregnant girlfriend Camilla who belongs to a rival gang, the Crickets. When Djibril is manipulated into killing the young Cricket Mahad, war breaks out. Djibril is haunted by the curse Mahad spat out as he lay dying, and begins to communicate with the spirit world….
